name: 3dCM
author: AFNI Developers
description: Tool for computing the center of mass of a dataset

inputs.description: Use the specified dataset as a mask. Only voxels with nonzero values in 'mset' will be averaged from 'dataset'. Both datasets must have the same number of voxels.
inputs.name: Mask file

inputs.description: After computing the CM of the dataset, set the origin fields in the header so that the CM will be at (x,y,z) in DICOM coordinates.
inputs.name: Set origin

inputs.description: Output values as (i,j,k) in local orientation.
inputs.name: Local IJK flag

inputs.description: Compute center of mass for each blob with specified voxel values.
inputs.name: ROI values

inputs.description: Automatically find all ROI values and compute their centers of mass.
inputs.name: All ROIs flag

inputs.description: Compute Internal Center, which finds the center voxel closest to the center of mass.
inputs.name: Internal Center flag

inputs.description: Compute Distance Center, the center voxel with the shortest average distance to all other voxels. This is computationally expensive.
inputs.name: Distance Center flag

output-files.description: Center of mass of the dataset.
output-files.name: Center of mass
